alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 8:41PM EDT until July 19 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 841 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East York, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... York, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, Shiloh, East York, Stonybrook-Wilshire, West York, Grantley, Tyler Run-Queens Gate, Stewartstown and North York. This includes Interstate 83 from mile markers 9 to 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
